name: CivicData
description: The only open government platform that brings together highly-actionable up-to-date government data from multiple agencies in a single location. It enables agencies to unlock the value of open data without digging into their budgets and supports building scalable solutions across multiple jurisdictions. The platform is built on open source using CKAN, a best-in-breed open source platform also used by data.gov, the UK, Australia, and many local and state jurisdictions.
